description: This file contains Python code for generating C++ source code for JSON-RPC communication, including registration of methods, properties, and events, as well as handling serialization and deserialization. It appears to be part of a code generation toolchain for a JSON-RPC framework.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates C++ code for emitting a JSON-RPC event, including function prototype, parameter handling, and notification call.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Outputs the boilerplate C++ code for the start of a RPC source file, including includes, namespace declarations, and version info.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Outputs the closing parts of the C++ namespace blocks for the RPC file.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main function to generate the bulk of JSON-RPC registration code, including methods, notifications, and events.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Orchestrates the generation of the entire RPC source code, combining prologue, main code, and epilogue.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates the version code section of the RPC source file.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
